mapper.select: SELECT emp_id_no, emp_pw, emp_id, emp_no, create_at, is_used, mat_no, is_locked, lock_until, failed_login_att, dept_code, code_id, two_step_method, token FROM emp_login WHERE emp_id = #{empId}

SELECT emp_id_no, emp_pw, emp_id, emp_no, create_at, is_used, mat_no, is_locked, lock_until, failed_login_att, dept_code, code_id, two_step_method, token FROM emp_login WHERE emp_id = #{empId} AND mat_no = #{matNo}
